body.p: This USB Standard-A connector is recessed and concealed beneath a cosmetic cover. It is suitable for connecting a small-sized device that needs to be constantly plugged into the PC. The USB nano receiver for a wireless mouse is a typical example of such devices.
body.note: This USB connector does not support SuperSpeed USB data transfer protocols. If you need to transfer a large volume of data between a USB device and your PC, consider selecting a USB connector that supports SuperSpeed USB data transfer protocols.
